text: Aasmanon aur zamin ki pedaeesh raat din ka hair pher kashtiyon ka logon ko nafa denay wali cheezon ko liye huye samandar mein chalna aasman say pani utaar ker murda zamin ko zinda ker dena iss mein her qisam kay janwaron ko phela dena hawaon kay rukh badalna aur badal jo aasmana ur zamin kay darmiyan musakhhar hain unn mein aqal mandon kay liye qudrat-e-elahee ki nishaniyan hain
